alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 1:20PM CDT until September 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tyler County in southeastern Texas... Jasper County in southeastern Texas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 119 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Chester to Roganville, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Woodville, Kirbyville, Colmesneil, Chester, Fred, Rockland, Warren, Town Bluff, Buna, Magnolia Springs, Mt. Union, Spurger, Roganville, Ivanhoe, and Hillister. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
